title: anyone want to give me tips for countering split push goddyr in low elo?
body:
Just lost a game where i personally roamed and went very well, but obviously could not stop the fucking udyr. I'm quite distraught as i've been demoted and I just can't possibly think of a way to beat a split push like that...
anyone have ideas on how to counter/build/want to baby rage about why Rito invented such a bs champion?

replies.body: If I'm fighting a splitpusher I usually buy zz'rot as it delays the wave long enough for you or your teammate to reach the lane before the turret gets chunked down too hard. However you could just master something like Fiora, Darius or Jax which it is possible to outplay enemies with.

He was actually playing top lane, and obviously because it's low elo the game went on for quite sometime. I would argue that he took almost every tower in the game on our side. But nunu is an idea for jg, thankyou
im joking bout that nunu tho. Nunu is trash lmao. Just play {{champion:24}}.

I honestly think Udyr is a top tier ban. In the long run, he's slightly too hard to coordinate against with an average matchmade team which means it's easier when you don't need to worry about him at all.
